name: Mini Mask Multiverse 4-Piece Mask Kit
about: What it is:A mini four-piece kit that lets you explore the mask multiverse for visibly calm, smooth, bright, hydrated skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Cucumber Extract: Soothes, hydrates, and purifies the look of dry skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:Multi-mask on the go and address every skin concern with a mini Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator, Pumpkin Enzyme Mask Enzymatic Dermal Resurfacer, 24K Gold Mask Pure Luxury Lift & Firm, and Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Mask Hydrating Gel..This Set Contains:- 0.47 oz/ 14 mL Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator.Clinical Results:In a 28-day study applying a 1% Pentavitin formulation:
ingredients: -Cucumber Extract: Soothes, hydrates, and purifies the look of dry skin..-Pumpkin Enzyme: Exfoliates for smooth skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: Is a potent hydrator that drenches skin with moisture and draws in water...Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/Leaf Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Sodium PCA, Allantoin, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090)...24K Gold Mask Pure Luxury Lift & Firm:.Glycerin, Water/Aqua/Eau, Gold/CI 77480, Olivine Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Carbomer, Mica, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Phenoxyethanol...Pumpkin Enzyme Mask Enzymatic Dermal Resurfacer:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Fruit, Alumina, Glycerin, Carbomer, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Fruit Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Phytate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum...Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Mask Hydrating Gel:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Carbomer, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hydroxide, Caffeine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citric Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Menthol, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Sodium Citrate, Menthoxypropanediol, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, FD&C Blue No. 1/CI 42090, Phenoxyethanol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator:.-Apply a generous coat to clean skin..-Allow mask to remain on for 10 minutes..-Rinse off with cool water..-For a cooling treat, refrigerate..-For an intensive session, apply a thin layer and leave on overnight..-Use two to three times a week or daily for extra hydration..-For external use only...24K Gold Mask Pure Luxury Lift & Firm:.-Apply a very generous, opaque layer to clean skin, covering your entire face..-Leave on for five to 10 minutes before rinsing thoroughly with warm water..-Use two to three times a week or as often as desired..-For external use only..-Avoid contact with eyes...Pumpkin Enzyme Mask Enzymatic Dermal Resurfacer:.-Apply a thin layer to clean skin..-Gently massage in circular motions with wet fingertips to activate the micro-polishing aluminum oxide crystals..-Leave on for three to seven minutes, depending on skin sensitivity..-Rinse thoroughly..-Use once or twice a week..-For external use only...Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Mask Hydrating Gel:.-Apply generously onto clean skin, avoiding the eye area..-Use as needed for a concentrated dose of hyaluronic acid..-Leave on for a minimum of three minutes or as long as desired. .-Rinse off..-For up to 72 hours of hydration with Pentavitin, use twice daily in the AM and PM..-For external use only.
